name: Samsung 990 EVO 4TB
description: High-capacity PCIe 5.0 SSD with 4TB storage and 10,000MB/s reads. Perfect for game libraries, video editing, and developers who need massive fast storage.

reviews.review_text: 4TB of blazing fast storage. Game libraries rejoice.
PCIe 5.0 speeds are insane. Video editing transformed.
Expensive but Samsung reliability is worth it.
